noun.description: Law (chiefly US). An informal request addressed to a court prior to or in place of a formal petition. rare.

adjective.description: Law (chiefly US). Occurring or existing prior to the filing of a petition, especially a bankruptcy petition.

adverb.description: Law (chiefly US). Prior to the filing of a petition, especially a bankruptcy petition.

origin: Early 16th century (in an earlier sense). From pre- + petition.
